response.overview: The Agents, follows three prominent accredited player agents over a 12-month period as they deal with the many challenges confronting their clients.  From injury, personal tragedy and the anxiety of the draft and trade periods, through to premiership and individual glory, The Agents provides a fascinating insight into Australiaâ€™s most popular domestic sport through a very unique lens.  There are 84 Accredited Player Agents, whose sole purpose is to help the 1000 plus AFL and AFLW players navigate their way through what is an increasingly complex AFL environment. This is their story.
response.title: The Agents
